attributes.action: PUT AN ACT IN PLACE TO STOP FACTORING COMPANIES DOING THE PUBLIC AN INJUSTICE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: WE ARE A  NEW HOUSING ESTATE WITH PROBLEMS WITH OUR FACTORING COMPANY WHICH IS MENT TO MAINTAIN OUR LANDSCAPES AND WOODLAND AREA. THERE ARE OTHER ESTATES IN THE SAME POSITION, IF NOT WORST THAN OURSELVES...TO REMOVE OR DISCUSS ANY ISSUE WITH THIS COMPANY'S WORK STANDARD TAKES A VERY LENGTHY PROCESS AND VERY COSTLY IF SOLICITORS ARE INVOLVED. THERE SHOULD BE AN ACT OR AMENDMENT IN PLACE,THAT MAKES THIS FAR EASIER FOR ALL INVOLVED INSTEAD OF US ASKING FOR HELP FROM MP,MSP AND SOLICITORS FOR LEGAL ADVICE.
